summary: This is an FBI Collected Item Log documenting the seizure of a DVR system (DVR System #2) from the Metropolitan Corrections Center (MCC) in New York on August 14, 2019. The seizure was part of the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased Inmate / Subject of Death Investigation
persons.context: The document identifies the case as related to Jeffrey Epstein and labels him as a victim in a death investigation.

events.title: Seizure of DVR System #2 from MCC
events.description: A TFO (Task Force Officer) from the NYPD seized a NICE VISION PRO Digital Video & Audio Recorder (DVR System #2) from the Metropolitan Corrections Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Corrections Center (MCC), 150 Park Row, New York, New York
keyFacts: A DVR system was seized from the Metropolitan Corrections Center on August 14, 2019, as part of the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The seizure was conducted by a TFO (Task Force Officer) from the NYPD.
The seized equipment was a NICE VISION PRO Digital Video & Audio Recorder, identified as DVR System #2.
The document is an FBI evidence log, indicating formal evidence collection procedures were followed.
The case is explicitly labeled as involving Jeffrey Epstein as a victim in a death investigation.
